title: RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Overview
content: The RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module is part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Series. It can be used for an accurate contactless thermal measurement for applications such as General purpose industry, temperature control of moving and hard to reach parts, body temperature measurement, non-contact thermometer for mobile and IoT application.
parent_content: The RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module is part of the RAKwireless WisBlock Series. It can be used for an accurate contactless thermal measurement for applications such as General purpose industry, temperature control of moving and hard to reach parts, body temperature measurement, non-contact thermometer for mobile and IoT application.

title: RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12003 Module Mounting Mechanism on WisBlock Base
content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12003 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12003 module can be mounted on the slots: **A, B, C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Mounting

**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12003 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12003 module can be mounted on the slots: **A, B, C, D, E, & F**.  
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Mounting

title: RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Connector Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12003 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 4**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
Only the **I2C** related pins, **VDD**, and **GND** are connected to this module.  
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor connector pinout
parent_content:

Only the **I2C** related pins, **VDD**, and **GND** are connected to this module.  
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor connector pinout

title: RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Mechanical Characteristics > WisConnector PCB Layout > WisConnector PCB Footprint and Recommendations [IMAGE]

RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Schematic Diagram > RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor I2C Address Configuration
content:
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor schematics  
> **TIP:** I2C address and pull-up
By default, the ADDR pin is connected to GND, and R1, R2, R3 are not connected. The WisBlock Base board has pull-up resistors and the I2C 7-bit slave address is 0x3a.
parent_content:
> **Image:** RAK12003 WisBlock Infrared Temperature Sensor schematics  
> **TIP:** I2C address and pull-up
By default, the ADDR pin is connected to GND, and R1, R2, R3 are not connected. The WisBlock Base board has pull-up resistors and the I2C 7-bit slave address is 0x3a.
